Certainly! Some modern stories and movies that feature these sea monsters include:

1. Pirates of the Caribbean - These movies feature Davy Jones, the captain of the Flying Dutchman, who is associated with the mythical figure of the same name. He is portrayed as a tentacled being with the power to control the sea and its creatures.

2. Clash of the Titans - This movie features the Kraken as a giant monster that is unleashed by the gods to destroy the hero Perseus.

3. Percy Jackson and the Sea of Monsters - This movie is based on the second book in the Percy Jackson series, and features the hero battling against a number of creatures from Greek mythology, including the Hydra and Charybdis.

4. The Little Mermaid - This Disney movie features Triton as the father of the titular character, Ariel, and depicts him as a powerful but loving ruler of the sea.

5. Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire - This book and movie feature the merpeople of the Black Lake, who are hired by Hogwarts to host the Triwizard Tournament.

These are just a few examples of how these ancient sea monsters and creatures have continued to capture our imaginations in modern times.
